questions.question: Considering the overall visual design, what best describes the style of this sofa?
What is the predominant color of the upholstery fabric covering the entire sofa?
What type of fabric appears to be used for the sofa's upholstery?
Describing the upholstery texture, is it smooth or patterned?
What shape best defines the arms of the sofa, rounded or straight?
What kind of legs support the sofa, metal or wood?
How many distinct seating sections or cushions does the sofa have?
Looking at the back cushions, what is the dominant pattern of the tufting?
Judging by the image, what is the overall length dimension of this sofa?
Observing the sofa's depth from front to back, what is the approximation?
What is the visible height of the sofa from the floor to its top?
Focusing on the sofa's legs, what color are they, light or dark?
Based on its visual characteristics, is the sofa compact or spacious?
Is the overall condition of the visible sofa shown new or used?
Considering the style and color, would you describe the overall feel of the piece as modern or classic?
